column4: i need some help.. im trying to get the nvidia beta driver (100.14.06) to work.. but i miss the nvidia-kernel-module. I have the kernel module for the 9755 driver.. how do i get the one i need?
boojah what videocard do you have?
the driver you got from nvidia comes witht he kernel module. but you need to compile it
and 97.55 will work fine for you
